title: PHILOPHROSYNE
content:
PHILOPHROSYNE was the personified spirit (daimona) of friendliness and welcome. She and her three
        sisters--Eukleia (Good Repute), Euthenia (Prosperity) and
        Eupheme (Acclaim)--were probably the goddesses known collectively as the younger Kharites (Charites).

HEPHAISTOS & AGLAIA
        (Orphic Rhapsodies Frag)

Other references not currently quoted here: Orphic Fragments.

A complete bibliography of the translations quoted on this page.
